Sparkle ğŸš€

Sparkle is a modern, high-performance, low-level, cross-platform game engine built on .NET 10 and C# 14.

Caution

This repository is still a work in progress.

âœ¨ Features âœ¨

  • ğŸ–¥ï¸ Overlay system for intuitive UI and HUD elements
  • ğŸ–Œï¸ GUI system for easy-to-use interfaces
  • ğŸ“¦ Content manager for streamlined asset loading and organization

ğŸª™ Installation

Via NuGet

dotnet add package Sparkle --version [VERSION]

From Source

  1. Clone this repository.
  2. Add Sparkle.csproj as a reference in your project.
